```{r knitrOptions, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
options(digits = 4, width = 80)
opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE,
  tidy = FALSE,
  include = TRUE,
  message = FALSE,
  cache = TRUE,
  dev = c("png"),
  fig.width = 6, fig.height = 3.5,
  dpi = 300,
  fig.pos = "H"
)
```

### load pkg
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

### transform dataset
```{r}
iris %>% tibble::as_tibble()
se <- function(x) sd(x) / sqrt(length(x))
df_stat <- iris %>%
  group_by(Species) %>%
  summarise_at(
    vars(Sepal.Length),
    c(mean = mean, se = se)
  )
df_stat
```

## plot
```{r}
ggplot(df_stat, aes(Species, mean, fill = Species)) +
  geom_errorbar(
    aes(ymin = mean * 0.9, ymax = mean + se),
    width = 0.2, size = 0.3
  ) +
  geom_col(color = "black", size = 0.3) +
  theme_classic()
```
